GBMPAGRA.MX.long_name: GBM Portafolio Agresivo SA de CV S.I.R.V A
GBMPAGRA.MX.summary: The Fund will seek to reduce the risk of investing in a single instrument, through participation in the share capital of other investment companies, investing mainly in companies of investment in debt securities and supplemented by equity and coverage, as well as other values of debt, both in direct and reported, taking as a reference a customer profile with a moderate risk tolerance.

INBURSAA.MX.short_name: OPERADORA INBURSA DE SOC DE INV
INBURSAA.MX.long_name: Fondo Inbursa SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
INBURSAA.MX.summary: The aim of FUND INBURSA, SA de CV, Sociedad Equity Investment (INBURSA) (the "Company" or the "Fund") is to look for its shareholders the highest possible return consistent with the investment regime and ranking. The Company, to achieve this goal, acquire investment assets whose nature corresponds to shares, stocks and securities or documents representing a debt owed by a third party (the "Investment Assets" or "Securities") with the Proceeds from the placement of shares of its capital stock among investors.
INBURSAA.MX.family: Operadora Inbursa de S.de Inv. SA de CV
